text.tspan: “I always wanted to but never had enough time and
motivation to actually start learning how to code.”
“Taking a CFG course will give me new skills that I cannot gain from my degree,
but which I can use in a variety of environments.”
“I would love to be able to start a website design business,
as well as aiding my current family business.”
“The opportunity to learn coding for free in an academic environment
seems very rare, and I would love to be a part of it.”
“I am a more mature student than most. I want to work hard to improve my life.
Learning coding is a step towards that and by helping myself I hope to be able to help others in the future.”
